segments.text: I see the boy on that stool, and I just know he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, just for a couple of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a disaster unfold, and there's nothing I can do about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets those cookies and gets down safely, but I'm not optimistic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like he's completely unaware of the consequences of his actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm he is, given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop him before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to learn a hard lesson today, one way or another.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a car crash in slow motion, and I can't do anything to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR
